1 to 2: 66.33
1 to 3: 67*99*75*84*86*82*86*100 = 25.34
1 to 4: 98*72*64*100 = 45.16
1 to 5: 98*72*64*100*100*71*84*100 = 26.93
1 to 6: 98*72*64*100*100*71*84*100*84*83*100 = 18.7 ; 67*99*75*73*100*100*90*66*74*81*99 = 12.8
1 to 7: 67*99*75*73*100 = 36.3; 98*72*71*86*100 = 43.08; 
1 to 8: 98*72*64*100*100*91*98*72*66*100 = 19.14
1 to 9: 65*99 = 64.35
1 to10: 65*100*90*77*40*83*96*100 =14.36; 65*83*96*78*15*78*95*100 = 4.49

Without_stellar_mass: (58.0223*m31[2,23]+19.3494*m31[3,23]+30.8328*m31[4,23]+17.319*m31[5,23]+13.074*m31[6,23]+21.454*m31[7,23]+13.756*m31[8,23]+30.524*m31[9,23]+7.047*m31[10,23])/9e2

Without_sfr:

(61.4893*m31[2,22]+26.6780*m31[3,22]+10.8602 *m31[4,22]+18.2791*m31[5,22]+16.6054 *m31[6,22]+19.7833*m31[7,22]+12.0525*m31[8,22]+32.7403*m31[9,22]+3.6429*m31[10,22])/9e2

for_Sfr=c(61.4893,26.6780,10.8602,18.2791,16.6054,19.7833,12.0525,32.7403,3.6429)/1e2
for_star=c(58.0223,19.3494,30.8328,17.319,13.074,21.454,13.756,30.524,7.047)/1e2
regs=c(2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10)


 all_reg_star=[11.8187,3.7593,4.1341,1.2835,4.5490,2.9115,0.8858,4.9986,1.2123]


 (11.8187*m31[2,23]+3.7593*m31[3,23]+4.1341*m31[4,23]+1.2835*m31[5,23]+4.5490*m31[6,23]+2.9115*m31[7,23]+0.8858*m31[8,23]+4.9986*m31[9,23]+1.2123*m31[10,23])/1e2

all_reg_sfr =c(49.3531,25.6016,27.1784,7.6212,16.4564,27.2770,4.2969,40.5704,15.9340)
(49.3531*m31[2,22]+25.6016*m31[3,22]+27.1784*m31[4,22]+7.6212*m31[5,22]+16.4564*m31[6,22]+27.2770*m31[7,22]+4.2969*m31[8,22]+40.5704*m31[9,22]+15.9340*m31[10,22])/1e2


all_reg_sfr_per_path=c(12.3383,3.2002,3.0198,0.6351,1.4960,3.4096,0.3305,5.7958,1.7704)
(12.3383*m31[2,22]+3.2002*m31[3,22]+3.0198*m31[4,22]+0.6351*m31[5,22]+1.4960*m31[6,22]+3.4096*m31[7,22]+0.3305*m31[8,22]+5.7958*m31[9,22]+1.7704*m31[10,22])/1e2
